about_the_game:
Devin Night Token Pack: Creature Codex 1: Aatxe - Cueyatl


The first pack from Kobold Press' Creature Codex. 56 tokens covering all the A's, b's and C's

This product contains:

  • Aatxe
  • Acid Ant
  • Agnibarra
  • Ahu Nixta
  • Ahuizotl
  • Al Bat King
  • AL Brother OX
  • AL Mouse Lord
  • AL Queen of Brids
  • Al Queen of Cats
  • Al Vulture Lord
  • Alkonost
  • Alliumite
  • Alp
  • Ammut
  • Angel Eye of The Gods
  • Angel Kinnara
  • Angel Ophanim
  • Angel Sammael
  • Angel Song
  • Angel Zoryas
  • Ankou
  • Anophiloi
  • Arborcyte
  • Arcamag
  • Arcanaphage
  • Astral Snapper
  • Axeban
  • Azi Dahaka
  • Baba Yaga
  • Barong
  • Bat Giant Albino
  • Bat Giant Vampire
  • Bearfolk Chieftan
  • Bearmit Crab
  • Bilwis
  • Bloody Bones
  • Bookkeeper
  • Bootgrabber
  • Carbuncle
  • Cats of Ulthar
  • Cauldronborn
  • Centuar Chieftan
  • Child of Yggdrasil
  • Chuhaister
  • Chupacabra
  • Clockwork Assassin
  • Clockwork Servant
  • Clockwork Soldier
  • Corpse Thief
  • Crimson Mist
  • Cueyatl Moon Priest
  • Cueyatl Sea Priest
  • Cueyatl Warrior
  • Cueyatl

Converted by: James Holloway

Released on December 05, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.7 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
